page.title: 01The life of Helen Oakes.
page.content: There are 6 people in our family,Mum Dad,Granny,my brothers Ian & Andrew, and me.On Monday I get up at 7:30am and go to school at 8:35am.I go home for lunch at 11:45am and go back to school at 1:00.I leave school at 3:00pm and watch T.V. from 3:30 until 4:00 and go to piano lessons from 4:15 to 4:45. I have my tea at 5:45 then play until bed time (9:00pm).On Sunday I go to Sunday school,the family lie in,then do jobs.Lunch is at 1:00pm then I play out or help Mum and Dad. Andrew goes to pop group practice. Mum makes tea at 5:30 then we watch T.V. until bed time.Sunday is different from week days because there's no school or work, but there is church. Our family's favourite food is Chinese and our hobbies are playing, singing or listening to music.
